snippet: AXT--H Thomas. In loving memory. On the first anniversary of his death, June 5, 2015. Your dashing style, flashing smile and love of life are all part of the precious memories that made our wonderful life together remain untouched. I miss you; as do all that knew and loved you. Love, Alan 1/3
lead_paragraph: AXT--H Thomas. In loving memory. On the first anniversary of his death, June 5, 2015. Your dashing style, flashing smile and love of life are all part of the precious memories that made our wonderful life together remain untouched. I miss you; as do all that knew and loved you. headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  AXT, H THOMAS
